{ "actions": [{ "name": "init", "preconditions": [], "uses": [] }], "code": "http://demo.fast.morfeo-project.org/gvsdata/forms/genericForm.src.html", "creationDate": "2010-09-07T16:04:37+0200", "creator": "admin", "description": {"en-gb": "This screen is generic and allows users define fields"}, "homepage": "http://www.deri.ie/genericForm", "icon": "http://demo.fast.morfeo-project.org/gvsdata/images/catalogue/genericForm.png", "id": 47, "label": {"en-gb": "Generic Form"}, "libraries": [], "name": "Generic Form", "parameterTemplate": "{
 /*
 * The acceptButtonLabel attribute is the label of the accept or send button
 */
 "acceptButtonLabel": "Accept",

 /*
 * The canceltButtonLabel attribute is the label of the clear button. If
 * this attribute is not used, no reset button will be shown.
 */
 "cancelButtonLabel": "Clear",

 /*
 * The fields attribute is a list of fields of the form, each of them
 * containing the following attributes:
 * - name(required): identifier of the field that will be used as a key
 * in the output data.
 * - type(optional): type of the field in text | password | checkbox |
 * textbox. By default: text.
 * - label(optional): the label to show for this input entry. If this
 * attribute is not defined, the name attribute will
 * be use.
 * - value(optional): the initial value for this field. If this
 * attribute is not defined, the field will be empty
 * at the beginning.
 * - required(optional): a boolean value indicating whether this field
 * is required or not.
 *
 * If this attribute is not defined, the following fields will be used.
 */
 "fields": [
 {
 "name": "input",
 "value": "value"
 }/*,
 {
 // Other field
 "name": "pass",
 "type": "password",
 "label": "Password",
 "value": "",
 "required": true
 },

 ... more fields ...
 
 */
 ]
}", "postconditions": [[{ "id": "item", "label": {"en-gb": "A Item"}, "pattern": "?Element http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type http://localhost:9000/FASTCatalogue/concepts/generic/GenericElement", "positive": "true" }]], "rights": "http://creativecommons.org/", "screenshot": "http://demo.fast.morfeo-project.org/gvsdata/images/screenshots/genericForm.png", "tags": [ {"label": {"en-gb": "generic"}}, {"label": {"en-gb": "form"}} ], "triggers": ["newItem"], "type": "form", "uri": "http://localhost:9000/FASTCatalogue/forms/47", "version": "1.0" }
